评论详情: Sizing runs VERY SMALL. I usually wear an XL or sometimes 2XL if sizing runs small and in this I needed a 4XL
This jacket is made of quality material. I also ordered a size bigger based on reviews and a size bigger fits perfectly.

We first bought the 2xl... my husband is 6'1", usually a 38" waist and xl shirts. It fit, but the sewn in vest seemed short, showing the shirt underneath even while wearing high waisted regency trousers. So we ordered a size up hoping the vest would be longer, but it wasn't. And the 3xl definitely looked large, especially in the arms and was loose when buttoned. So we returned the larger and just worked with the short vest. Didn't effect the look.

评论概述: Good but not what I was expecting
评论详情: Size was true to the specifications It fits me well and it’s comfortable the only thing about it. The Vest is sewn in and it’s not separate and I could’ve missed it, but I didn’t see anywhere saying that the vest was shown in and not separate. It will still work for what I need, but I would’ve liked to be separate.
My husband is a 3X but I ordered a 4X so it might fit more comfortably. It wouldn’t even button and the shoulders were too tight. So disappointing.

评论概述: They sent me the wrong size
评论详情: I ordered a 4x size jacket, and while it arrived promptly, it was tiny. It barely was able to wrap around my shoulders. I don't know whether this was an accident, or if it was due to a very different sizing chart, but regardless I will be returning the coat and looking elsewhere in the future.

Ordered a size I know is larger than I would normally just so I could wear this comfortably, however, the back panels aren't wide enough for me to cross my arms over my chest as it is much too tight and feels as though it will rip out.
The size is completely wrong was supposed to be a 4xl but you make it too small for those with American size stop using another country size it messes things up for people that's bigger
Arm length on xl jacket was around 30” long so I had to correct for my husband but otherwise this Jacket was so perfect for our Bridgerton inspired photo shoot!

评论概述: great, but too fat the buttons would snap open
评论详情: The collar was so cool!  This is really quality made.  It fit really nice.  Our only problem is they didn't make one size bigger so that the buttons on the connected vest didn't pop open.  Almost kept it any way.  It is the real deal.  Worth the money and I just wish they made one size bigger.

This jacket is perfection! Much better quality than I was expecting. My husband is 6’2 with a 32” waist. He normally wears a small or medium depending on brand, and we got the small. It fit perfectly. It is very long, as you can see in the pictures.

My husband ordered this for a Bridgerton party. He was very impressed by the overall quality of this jacket. It was quite thick and kept him warm in frigid temperatures that night as the party was outdoors. The tailcoat is quite long which is perfect for my husband as he is 6' 3''. Overall quality is phenomenal! There is not much stretch with the jacket which was not a problem for my husband. I highly recommend for a renaissance party or Bridgerton party!
not a perfect fit but got the job done . everyone loved it at cos play wedding
Surprisingly good material - does not feel cheap
Not as dark a purple as the picture shows. But worked wonderfully to my joker costume.
The vest is attached to the coat lining and does not go low enough to cover the belt and bottom of shirt.

评论概述: GREAT QUALITY FOR A LOW PRICE!
评论详情: Quality is better than I had expected! sturdy thick cotton twill nice finishing no smell Fits perfect! 6'4" 215 lbs = size L-XL
It arrived on time. It's not "robe material" it's a thin denim Looks great True to size. I wear a large, I ordered lol a large, and I got a large. Overall 10\10

评论概述: Extremely small. 4xl is about an American medium other than that great quality for a costume.
评论详情: Size is very inaccurate.

This is a super comfortable and highe quality costume peice. Thick material and a nice weight and length to it. Now, I'm 6'3 with long arm and WIIIIDE shoulders. I got the XXL just to be on the safe side and it fits great. A little snug when you sit down, so no ice cream that day, lol. But I love the coat. It'll be a versatile steampunk, vampire or victorian peice.
Liked the look.. didn’t realize the vest was part of the coat..
EXACTLY what i wanted!

评论概述: Sizing and feel is very uncomfortable and disproportional
评论详情: The arms are extremely short (1/3 past the elbow… looks like a baseball tee in the arms) and the waist /chest is way too loose. Feels like wearing a giant denim jean jacket. It’s heavy. It’s not comfortable at all. I wish I’d have been able to try it on before I can’t return it anymore. Hopefully I’ll be able to somehow make it wearable so as not to waste this much money but as it is, unfortunately, it’s not wearable.
The fabric is great  but the size was suppose to be a 4XL but actually fits a person who wears a large so disappointing 😞 I will have to return it.
This product is not true to size. That was the smallest 4x i have ever seen

I had to return my original order because I ordered according to my normal size. I typically wear a Large, but with this I definitely had to orfer a few sizes up. Once I got the right one, it fit great. Good thick material, almost a thick denim like material.

I ordered this for my husband for the Bridgerton Experience. It was the 3rd coat we had ordered and this one was perfect. The quality felt better than costume quality. It ironed well. Seemed well made and comfortable.

评论概述: I had to add stretching fabric.
评论详情: I was too big for the largest size so I had to add extra stretching fabric so I could hold it closed. It was great material though.
Fit was perfect on my husband. Well made and quick shipping.
Good

Was looking for a long split tail jacket.  I am 6' and 240 pounds, the 3X fits really well.  Cool looking jacket/vest combination with great lines and sturdy build.  This can be used for all kinds of events.
Sewn strong, no issues.

评论概述: This versatile coat is a must have.
评论详情: Purchased coat for a Ghost Tour, grave divining  demonstration and fit the 1800s theme well. This is a quality coat that I recommend over others since it is actual cotton. You will need to do some ironing and removing so threads. I have done some civil war re-enactments that has given me a eye to quality and this coat is it. Do your measuring and following the guide before your order.

My son ordered this for a masquerade ball homecoming dance. It is great quality, the fabric is thick and everything is well made. The coat length is quite long. My son is 5'9" and the coat falls below his knees, almost a duster length. He and to use this for a vampire costume as well.

Great jacket very warm though so if you are using it for a costume or cosplay be ready to sweat. Also I originally ordered the size recommended to me by Amazon and it was way too tight in the chest and shoulders so I recommend ordering one size larger than what Amazon says you should order.
Was a bit darker then what I was looking for but ended up being perfect. Super high quality but a bit on the heavy side
My fiance will wear it at our wedding

评论概述: Great fit, thicker than expected, sturdy
评论详情: I used this jacket for a costume and it worked out wonderfully. I love that the buttons are snap-on instead of sliding through the fabric, it made them stay and removing the jacket/vest was fast and easy. The vest is sewn to the jacket FYI so you cannot just wear one or the other. The jacket was not as flimsy as I thought it would have been, either.
Great

I was surprised how nice the coat is considering the cost. It's made of a nice heavy cotton. The tails go down to my mid calves. The pockets are small but meant not to show from the front so makes sense. The shoulders are a little tight and you can't really raise your arms up high without it binding. The small back strap is sewn on so you can't adjust the waist. I will probably get a friend to make that slight alteration. All together it's a really good tailcoat for the cost.

Is a woven cotton, and clearly looked like it when worn. But it is not lined with anything, so it has the slight appearance of a costume because of how thin it is, but when worn with layers like I did, it looked like a high quality black coat. In the dim light of the Bridgerton Ball that I wore it at, I could say it might even pass for wool. It felt very worth the purchase at the time, the only thing is, I don't see any utility for it outside of that ball, since there is no lining to the coat, and will probably look cheep if not wore with thick layers underneath.
Great product! Tight fit.  I'm normally an XL, this fight like a shrinken L.

评论概述: Looked great and made from strong material
评论详情: I’m a very chesty 44 and this fit perfect. I’m 5’9” and 205. The material was of surprisingly high quality and I believe this costume will stand the test of time. It’s a great buy!
Stitching here and there is sub-par (see video)  but otherwise a great-looking piece.

My son wanted something unique for prom. Wasn't sure what it would be like, but the quality was very good, heavy fabric, good details and stitching. Needed to take it in because we ordered it large, but that wasn't a problem. Really happy with the result, he loved it, his friends loved it, and it didn't break the bank!

评论概述: Great quality and good for cosplay
评论详情: Bought mens small for a teen boy who wears a 16/18 and fit great. Much heavier better quality than a cheaper one we first got from Amazon. Made a perfect steampunk costume.

评论概述: DO NOT TRUST SIZE CHART!  It's 3-4 sizes smaller than what it states.
评论详情: Bought a few sizes up because the chart showed my chest size being closer to a 4x. Bought it because I should have had some extra room with it. Came in and I couldn't get my 2nd arm in it, and the one arm I did get in had a lot of skin showing.  If you're buying this, order like 5-6 sizes larger than you usually do...which is just crazy...
For an inexpensive costume type jacket this does well.  The vest is stitched in, and the outside jacket does not close, but that makes a distinct look which could be what you are looking for.

Iam 6"2 235lbs 46in chest. Ordered the xxl coat fit well except sleeves were tight under the arms so it restricts upper arm movement above sholders and sleeve cuffs were about 1/2 short but cuff looks like it it can be unstitched and let out and restitched. Overall nice material well worth the price though i thought. Hope this helps others. Had seamtress restitch the cuffs to lengthen sleeves and she put in a 2inch diamond cut shape add in the armpits to help with upper arm moment. Fixed all my problems and it fits great now. Love it.

评论概述: IT SMELLS SO WEIRD I HATE THE SMELL I CANT EVEN WEAR IT
评论详情: It stinks. Like literally smells like cat pee. I can’t get the smell out.

评论概述: good quality but NOT EVEN CLOSE to the size stated
评论详情: good quality on the craftsmanship, looks and feels rugged, I'm sure someone will get a lot of use out of this product, just not me. the sizing is way off. ordered a 4x and I knew it would be close (seemed like it would be a good goal to get into) but not in this existence nor the next is it anywhere near a 4x (2x maybe). too bad as I would really have loved wearing it. if it had fit better it would have been a full 5 stars. really worth it if it fits you.

Amazing jacket for goth, steampunk or just a loud Victorian look. Sturdy quality. Color is a muted purple or plum. I followed the seller’s measuring instructions, got one size larger to accommodate layers/shoulders, and it firs perfectly.

评论概述: Nice costume, but way too small
评论详情: This was easily 2 sizes too small.  Nice costume if you can fit in it.  Good value.  Too bad correct size not available.
My daughter purchased this jacket for her "Battle Wanda" costume.  It is really well made and very comfortable.  She worr it for 8 hours at Disneyland and got lots of compliments.

I like it.  Really solid for costume wear but hard to see as a regular part of my wardrobe due to the faux vest.  Tried very hard to figure the right size before ordering.  Chose XXXL and it fits like a sack except for arms and shoulders.  If it helps you, I'm 5' 10", 190lbs with a 10 inch drop from chest to waist.  Think it's worth taking down to the tailor  though.
I used this for a pirate outfit for the ren faire and it was fantastic quality and fit quite well
The product was too small and I ordered a size up as was recommended in the comments.
Way smaller than advertised but decent quality for the cost
Did not fit

评论概述: This will be my new go to company!
评论详情: I measured myself and then got the correct size. I am 6 ‘ 3” tall and 260 pounds. Not to many things for the first time. This is my new favorite company.
as so many others have stated, this item ruins way too small, soo frustrated and disgusted with this.

评论概述: Fits great, thick material and good quality.
评论详情: Great for our Bridgerton party.  Fits perfectly!!

The quality is great, material is mostly cotton, nicely made. It shrunk a small amount when I washed it and hung it to dry, which was perfect for me— I am 5 ft/117 lbs. and purchased size small. Before it shrunk, it was a little long on me. Very pleased with this jacket

评论概述: It fit well, and looked great. Great for cosplay and general use.
评论详情: I remember purchasing this in an old account back in 2016.  I've been waiting to purchase it again since 2018. I'm not sure if they made any changes to the product, but assuming it is still the same, I plan to purchase it again.  I honestly loved the product. It went well with my personal wardrobe and overall outfit.  It was a good product. I am 6"3, slim fit. It was slightly larger than my waist and shoulders, but it still fit well.
Bought it a size larger and it still doesn't fit
Fits great. Wish the best part was removable, but it’s an awesome coat for cosplay. I wear a large -xl in jackets. I ordered the XXL and it fit just right
Unfortunately, this was not exactly what I needed for my husband but it is made well, fits well and comfortable.
I just felt meh. About it. Like at first I was super excited but then it got here and meh.

I ordered a 4XL just to be safe.  It is still 2 sizes too small and no time to return it and get a larger size!  My husband is only a 2XL!  This is for a huge fundraiser and am super upset!  I live in rural Wyoming so there are no options for my husband!!
The product has no stretch and is really small we took the seams out and made it work for what we needed
Runs small- order size up if not 2. Quality is not bad, but expect for a costume, for someone looking for a fashionable coat this is not for everyday wear.

评论概述: Heavy, scratchy uncomfortable low quality denim like
评论详情: This felt like a scratchy heavy low quality denim definatly not a soft cotton jacket it was described to be.

评论概述: The sizing is way off, but the quality is okay.
评论详情: I used the product as part of a steampunk costume I put together. It made of good quality material and stitching, but not one Id use for cold days. As part of a costume it was good enough. The sizing is quite weird. I bought a 4X and am 5'10 with a small gut. Usually I wear 1X to 2X shirts and coats to accommodate. I saw reviews that the sizing was quite different from what we are used to in the US. I have a stocky build and my chest and shoulders were barely accommodated by the 4X. I felt that a small flexing of my shoulders would tear the coat apart. So if you a bigger man than me then you might not fit.

I bought this for a Thanksgiving celebration. The quality of the fabric was impressive. I was very pleased with the length as well. My date is a tall guy, so it looked quite nice! This jacket is just what we were looking for to go with the colonial theme!
I ware a XXL jacket. Ordered XXXl and it was more like an XL tall. So they need to let there customers know it is for skinny people only.

评论概述: Nice jacket, different material, but still stylish
评论详情: This is more than just a costume, it is actually a nice jacket to wear regularly. It is not very lined or warm so best for fall or spring. It is not leather although it looks like that in the picture. The material is a thicker polyester but well made. I gave in and bought this for one of my kids for halloween but it was more than I wanted to pay for it. Was the only one available at that time and looks like what we wanted.

I got an XL for my husband who's 5'7" and about 190 lbs. It fit the way I expected.  It's a tad bit loose around the belly but a bit of sewing can fix that. The material is not cheap at all! It's heavyweight. Its ling in the back about mid calf length. The buttons are real snap buttons and it has real pockets. I'm going to wash it because the stiffness of the jacket makes it a bit uncomfortable he says, and hard to get the wrinkles out. So it definitely must be ironed before wearing! But I am pleased that it is NOT that crappy material most costumes in a bag are. Great touch to match our Victorian theme couples costumes for this Halloween.

As someone who first bought a cheaper version of this coat I can say - this is worth the upgrade. Not just in appearance but it cut. This fits like a coat should. I am female and it’s a bit long on me but it’s a much smaller problem than a coat that is too tight about the shoulders. So spend the extra cash this is worth it!

I bought this jacket, because I'm putting together a custom butler costume for Halloween and wanted something that would last. The jacket came as advertised and looks great. The vest buttons are a snap together design and are attached to the jacket with stitching. Let's talk size. I'm a 6' 1'' tall, 266 pounds with some gut. I read the reviews of it being small, so I ordered the 4x size. I normally wear a XL or 2XL depending on make. I'm really happy I went 4x, because it fit great. The 4x is more like a 2x suit jacket. The vest snapped and jacket felt comfortable. I do have fairly large biceps and as still able to have decent mobility wearing it. I really like the jacket and am happy with the quality.
Was awesome
I went up in size expecting it to be a little on the small size. It felt like a medium or a large not a 3xl.
I've gotten a few jackets in this style online before and this is by far the highest quality I've found. Great heavy fabric, the snaps are all great, its as expected, and its super long! Perfect!!
Bought the biggest size and I'm usually a XL in US but it was like a medium.

评论概述: The darkchic clothing are great looking styles
评论详情: I like the look and feel of this well made coat. I find it to be more than a costume coat. I do whear it for the great look and style. I'm about 5 foot 9 and about 195 and I find that 4xl fits me well. For someone who truly likes the dressy look a great coat to have.
Perfect for my bloodborne  hunter cosplay. Very sturdy material.

I was honestly surprised with the quality of this jacket. For the price I was expecting a rather thin material jacket but it’s actually very decent. My only complaint is that the sleeves are a little too long for my arms, but with my basic sewing skills I was able to fix that.  I wore this jacket to a lot of winter events and it definitely helped keep me from freezing, I’m hoping once summer rolls around it will still be wearable in the heat.

Used this for a Halloween costume. I am 5'3 and 230lbs - 54 inch bust, 38 inch waist, 52 inch hips. The buttons are brass and snap together and it's a little long in the arms since I am so short and is quite roomy at a 2XL. It is quite warm as well (at least in October in Florida). The vest does not detach. I really like it but it is a little big to wear normally.

Beautiful frock. However the sizing is off a fair bit.  I wear a 2XL and the 4XL fits like it’s barely a 2 XL.  It would be nice if they offered a custom feature so one could order the proper size. This jacket has been featured in 2 community shows.

评论概述: Ordered XL Tall. I am a 46-48 chest. The sleeves fit but the XL was more like a 44" chest.
评论详情: Loved the material and durability.

评论概述: I used it for a Scottish Rite Degree
评论详情: We had to dress like someone would in the 1780s. It wasn't perfect for that but it worked. The built in vest was very small and did not match the size ordered. I had to order another vest and pin the built-in one back so I could make the costume work I order a separate vest.
Returned upon opening. Didn't realize it was all attached (one piece), cheap material, color was not as advertised. Fail.
The build quality is okay, but it's a coarser material than it appears to be.  It fits snug around the shoulders, so order a size or two up.

I am 5’8 163 pounds, I usually wear a 42 short. I got the L/L. It fit like a 40 long. I spent a little time shortening the sleeves 4” and added some buttons. Good, heavy cotton muslin fabric, well stitched with long tails. Coat with faux vest attached; vest is satin lined and I bet I could tack it up when I want just the coat.  Danced the entire night and was a fashion hit at the Cowboy/Victorian Ball! May get red next year.

评论概述: Actual Jacket, doesnt feel like a costume
评论详情: I am a 42" Sport Coat 185 lbs pear shaped, bought extra large, quite roomy, perfect fit in the chest and the belly, little long in the sleeves and the tail.  very nice look and weight of material, bought for a costume christmas party, will probably win the prize!

The coat is worth exactly what I paid. No complaints. That is to say that a really good, well-tailored coat like this would cost $300 or more.  I bought it  in the smallest size (S) for a stage costume, 1840's gentleman.  I rolled the collar more, removed the sewn-in vest and sewed the tails up to make it knee length.  Off-the-shelf the vest was about four fingers too big (I am a 30 waist), but it is a bit small around the shoulders (34 Regular).  The fabric is not stiff enough to drape well (again, consider the price), but with a lot of ironing I got it almost good enough. Am considering starch or adding stiffening fabric inside the chest.  As I said, no complaints. I got exactly what I needed for a price I could afford.

评论概述: Wish I had a picture of this
评论详情: WOW!! The fabric.. the workmanship.. the EVERYTHING is AMAZING in this coat. I liked it so much, that when I ordered the LARGEST size & it didn't fit my xxxxxxxxx lg friend, I kept it and ordered a smaller size for someone else. It does have VERY long tails. We chose to hem them up a little on our shorter person, but it is PERFECT!! I could not make this from scratch for this price at this quality.
Wrong color

So I originally bought another very similar jacket from a different vendor. I didn't love that jacket - it was thin, shiny, polyester, dry clean only material. But it was just for a Halloween costume so... Anyway, I then saw this and ordered it. Wow! MUCH nicer jacket - more of a canvas, thick cotton material. Well constructed, beautiful deep purple and best of all machine washable! Heck - I may just wear this even after Halloween! For reference I am 6'2", 180lbs and the size M fit just great.

评论概述: Runs a little small, but looks fantastic.
评论详情: I typically wear L to XL. I ordered XXL and it fit nice and snug. So pay attention to the chart. It's very nice quality, especially for the price! Wonderful and definitely worth it.
Too long. Had to have it altered
